text: The Uzola, also spelled as Usola (Узола, Усола in Russian) is a river in Nizhny Novgorod Oblast in Russia. It is a left tributary of the Volga. The length of the river is . The area of its basin is .«Река Узола (Усола)», Russian State Water Registry The Uzola freezes up in November and stays under the ice until April. == References == Category:Rivers of Nizhny Novgorod Oblast
title: Uzola
